summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of First Avenue Northeast from East Forty-third Street to East Fifty-second Street et al., in the City of Seattle., by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 23094, creating Local Improvement District No. 2257 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
